steps.sql: SELECT id FROM materials WHERE name = 'Silk';
steps.description: Retrieve the material ID for the material with the name "Silk"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM warehouse_material WHERE material_id = '5';
steps.description: Retrieve the warehouse material IDs that correspond to the material ID obtained in Step1

steps.sql: SELECT sewing_task_id FROM sewing_material_allocation WHERE warehouse_material_id IN ('5');
steps.description: Retrieve the sewing task IDs that use the warehouse material IDs obtained in Step2

steps.sql: SELECT * FROM sewing_tasks WHERE id IN ('11', '12', '13', '14');
steps.description: Retrieve the details of the sewing tasks using the sewing task IDs obtained in Step3
